itunes:title: Drinkin' Bros Fake News #88 - Adiós Ted Cruz

itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway give their thoughts on Ted Cruz’s trip to Cancun amid the winter storm that has crippled his and our home state of Texas, how AWFUL Texas drivers are and why most Texans with big trucks actually own them to make up for the...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway give their thoughts on Ted Cruz’s trip to Cancun amid the winter storm that has crippled his and our home state of Texas, how AWFUL Texas drivers are and why most Texans with big trucks actually own them to make up for their small peens — plus Jarred Taylor gets on the show to talk about big tech and social media censorship.
